name: Higherplane Snake
description:
Hey!

This is my first attempt making game from start to finish by myself. 

The game was inspired by snake in a more free movement other than being constrained in specific slots.

Due to being made with unreal (and me not being too experienced with it), I could not get the file below ~200MB when unzipped.

It's not the best, but I will keep on improving on my future projects, please have a look and hopefully you can get a few minutes of fun out of it!

For all devlogs that you might be interested in, please head over to https://doowahree.com/
